resources.string: New user, tap here to register !

This is my semester project in Spring-2018 for SWE331 course. I am just a beginner in android application development. This application was made to learn Object oriented software depelopment , basic things of android developmant and the use of apis in android depelopment. I used fairebase authentication and firebase cloud messageing service. I tried to use api.ai . But for time maintanache I couldnot able. Then I used simsimi api for chat with robot feature.
